conversations.body_text: Hi Adriano250RS,  Sure. May I ask why you want to cancel this order?

Hi

I actually found some replacement elastomers at a local shop, but i would
still like to purchase the hydraulic rod for clutch only.

On Tue, Jul 15, 2025 at 4:06 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Adriano250RS,  So we'll cancel the elastomer for you and send you a 2-way hydraulic rod, is that okay?

That would be great thank you.

On Tue, Jul 15, 2025 at 5:11 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Adriano250RS,    Okay, I've you canceled the elastomers.
